import React, { useState } from 'react' const NavBar =()=>{ const [searchKey, setSearchKey] = useState('') const fetchMovies = async (searchKey) => { const type = searchKey ? 'search' : 'discover' const { data: { results }, } = await axios.get(`${API_URL}/${type}/movie`, { params: { api_key: API_KEY, query: searchKey, }, }) setMovies(results) setMovie(results[0]) if (results.length) { await fetchMovie(results[0].id) } } const searchMovies = (e) => { e.preventDefault() fetchMovies(searchKey) } return(
